name: Soros Foundation-Moldova
goal: The Soros Foundation-Moldova is a non-governmental, non-for-profit and non-political organization which was established in 1992 by the financier and the philanthropist George Soros to promote the development of an open society in Moldova by developing and implementing a range of programs and activities that address specific areas of needs including legal reform, good governance,  public health, civic engagement and media.
interests: Culture and media, Education and training, European Neighbourhood Policy, Foreign affairs and security policy, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Youth
euInitiatives:
- European Commission communication on combating HIV/AIDS in the EU and neighbouring countries
- EU Health Programme (2014-2020)
- Confidence Building Measures Program
